CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1950, pg. 2 reads: "Eviction Blues - Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Washington and family were evicted from a house at 2834 Vera Street they had occupied fourteen years Monday afternoon. Owners of the house live next door.  They are Mr. and Mrs. Scott Archer.  Mrs. Washington told The Courier she was going to live with friends and had no prospects of a new permanent home.  Mr. Washington has been a victim of paralysis for a number of years and the family lives on assistance. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Washington and family, posed with pile of furniture after being evicted from home at 2834 Vera Street
